attributes.action: Deport sentenced foreigners to free up spaces & detain people carrying weapons
attributes.additional_details:
We are loosing a generation to crime related to people carrying weapons. So many people, especially under 18s are being killed everyday by people carrying knifes. The government & criminal system needs to get tough on people carrying weapons. 
There are no excuses for carrying weapons & non should be considered when arresting & sending people to prisons.
Law & order needs to be up held now at all costs & without any excuses.
Too many young lives are being lost & wasted.
attributes.background: The government to pass a bill to deport foreign criminals that have been sentenced to free up prison spaces & start locking up people carrying weapons, especially knifes to a minimum of 3-10 years.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093

Any crime involving a knife to get a minimum 10 year custodial sentence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711379
